$interpreted: Bull Contestant: Hurry up! The Alliance has sent a whole company of troops to secure the port, just so you can catch a ship back to the Kingdom of the Sun.
Bull Contestant: Who knows how many of us have been gobbled up by monsters while you lot dillydally about...!
Himawari: Yeah, Juan-Yun's asked you to leave, not to ride around and eat for free at our expense~
Sun Kingdom Soldier: Damn! Who'd wanna spend a minute longer with—
Ace: ...Let's not make a scene. We're leaving.
Sione: Ace, by the looks of things...
Ace: I know, they can't wait to get rid of us. They aren't protecting us—they're deporting us.
Sione: But why...
Ace: ...Somebody thinks we'll be causing trouble if we stay any longer.
Ace: We're loyal subjects of Her Majesty and the Kingdom of the Sun. If the East want to go their own way, that's their business.
Sione: I know... but...
Ace: ...Enough, don't push them. Just let them trail at the back.
Ace: They just found out their teacher's dead, after all.
Ace: ...There's no harm in giving them a moment.
Alliance Soldier: ...Monsters! Monsters incoming!!
Himawari: Bull...!
Bull Contestant: D-don't worry! I'll go take a look, you stay here!
Alliance Soldier: H-help us!
Himawari: ...Keep going!
Sione: But the monsters...
Himawari: We're enough to deal with it, a teeny weeny monster won't do us any harm. I promised Yuan-Jun I'd get you to that ship on time!
Ace: ...All right. We respect your country's decisions.
Ace: Move!
Alliance Soldier: ....Gwaaaaagh!!!!
Bull Contestant: Heck! Don't fall back, hold the line!
Tica: Hey... ehhh!? Wait a minute!
Elio: They're in trouble! Aren't we going to help them?
Ace: This is their choice.
Sione: I understand how you feel. But the East have abandoned the Bewitchers and our research.
Sione: There's nothing you two can do by hanging around any longer. That's why Li Hwa urged you to leave, too.
Tica: How can you say that...
Himawari: The ship'll be held up!
Himawari: Your headmaster's dead already, so what are you still here for? You waiting to go pay your respects or something!?
Himawari: Wh-what are you staring at me for!? He's dead, all right? You think he'd want you to stay a moment longer?
Sione: Miss Himawari, please—
Tica: ...He was nothing like you imagine.
Elio: Pay our respects... Wouldn't you want to pay your respects to your father?
Tica: "The runes exist for people's happiness—Via Soul!"
Himawari: Wh-what now, have they gone soft in the head!?
Ace: Heh...
Ace: They're finally reading from the same script... They've been taught well.
Tica: Let's go, Rune Academy!!
Elio: We're outnumbered... We have to flee.
Bull Contestant: Easier said than done! How are we supposed to get out of this!?
Elio: Hmm, if we can get them all to gather in one place...
Elio: I got it! Crystals!
Tica: Crystals?
Elio: Crystals are grown from the powder of gems rich in Soul Energy.
Elio: As long as we can simulate that Soul Energy, we should be able to attract the monsters... Ah, but...
Bull Contestant: What? Isn't it possible?
Elio: I'm a Life Magic specialist, I shouldn't have any problem with simulating Crystals' Soul Energy,
Elio: but without the Academy's duplicator, I can't copy the runes...
Tica: Ohh, you needn't worry about that. Just leave it to Tica, superstar champion of Applied Magic~!
Tica: Let's make some runes!
Elio: ...All right!
Bull Contestant: We'll take care of those monsters for now, but hurry!
Tica: A little of this, a little of that... Add a lil somethin'...
Elio: And adjust those runes on the outside there...
Tica: ...Finished!
Bull Contestant: Quick, now's our chance!

Model.Text: Hurry up! The Alliance has sent a whole company of troops to secure the port, just so you can catch a ship back to the Kingdom of the Sun.
Who knows how many of us have been gobbled up by monsters while you lot dillydally about...!
Yeah, Juan-Yun's asked you to leave, not to ride around and eat for free at our expense~
Damn! Who'd wanna spend a minute longer with—
...Let's not make a scene. We're leaving.
Ace, by the looks of things...
I know, they can't wait to get rid of us. They aren't protecting us—they're deporting us.
But why...
...Somebody thinks we'll be causing trouble if we stay any longer.
We're loyal subjects of Her Majesty and the Kingdom of the Sun. If the East want to go their own way, that's their business.
I know... but...
...Enough, don't push them. Just let them trail at the back.
They just found out their teacher's dead, after all.
...There's no harm in giving them a moment.
...Monsters! Monsters incoming!!
Bull...!
D-don't worry! I'll go take a look, you stay here!
H-help us!
...Keep going!
But the monsters...
We're enough to deal with it, a teeny weeny monster won't do us any harm. I promised Yuan-Jun I'd get you to that ship on time!
...All right. We respect your country's decisions.
Move!
....Gwaaaaagh!!!!
Heck! Don't fall back, hold the line!
Hey... ehhh!? Wait a minute!
They're in trouble! Aren't we going to help them?
This is their choice.
I understand how you feel. But the East have abandoned the Bewitchers and our research.
There's nothing you two can do by hanging around any longer. That's why Li Hwa urged you to leave, too.
How can you say that...
The ship'll be held up!
Your headmaster's dead already, so what are you still here for? You waiting to go pay your respects or something!?
Wh-what are you staring at me for!? He's dead, all right? You think he'd want you to stay a moment longer?
Miss Himawari, please—
...He was nothing like you imagine.
Pay our respects... Wouldn't you want to pay your respects to your father?
"The runes exist for people's happiness—Via Soul!"
Wh-what now, have they gone soft in the head!?
Heh...
They're finally reading from the same script... They've been taught well.
Let's go, Rune Academy!!
We're outnumbered... We have to flee.
Easier said than done! How are we supposed to get out of this!?
Hmm, if we can get them all to gather in one place...
I got it! Crystals!
Crystals?
Crystals are grown from the powder of gems rich in Soul Energy.
As long as we can simulate that Soul Energy, we should be able to attract the monsters... Ah, but...
What? Isn't it possible?
I'm a Life Magic specialist, I shouldn't have any problem with simulating Crystals' Soul Energy,
but without the Academy's duplicator, I can't copy the runes...
Ohh, you needn't worry about that. Just leave it to Tica, superstar champion of Applied Magic~!
Let's make some runes!
...All right!
We'll take care of those monsters for now, but hurry!
A little of this, a little of that... Add a lil somethin'...
And adjust those runes on the outside there...
...Finished!
Quick, now's our chance!
